headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Five Minutes of Flame
content:
Forget the nine-to-five. Invest in an Arena Workshop, sign the world’s biggest waiver & your real career begins.

Every victory boosts your rep - progress through sponsorship tiers to unlock major perks: arena modifications, rare Pegasus vehicles, new clothes & items.

Don’t forget: Arena War brings 40 new awards, 20 matching trophies for your office, and if personal supremacy isn’t enough of an incentive, as you progress you’ll reap some juicy cash and RP as you plow through the competition.
